thread.title: No. 17 Oklahoma’s pass defense among nation’s best
thread.title_full: No. 17 Oklahoma’s pass defense among nation’s best

author: wtopstaff
title: No. 17 Oklahoma’s pass defense among nation’s best
text:
No. 17 Oklahoma’s pass defense among nation’s best By CLIFF BRUNT October 19, 2015 5:40 pm 
NORMAN, Okla. (AP) — Oklahoma’s pass defense was a liability last season, and it appeared more of the same was in store this year after Tulsa torched the Sooners for 427 yards through the air a month ago. 
Since then, Oklahoma has been stellar against the pass. In league games, the 17th-ranked Sooners (5-1, 2-1 Big 12) lead the conference in scoring defense, pass defense and interceptions and are second in sacks. Overall, Oklahoma ranks ninth nationally in pass defense. 
The Sooners will be tested this week. Texas Tech (5-2, 2-2) ranks second nationally in passing yards per game (427.6), second in total offense (623.7) and third in scoring offense (49.4). Tech quarterback Patrick Mahomes already has thrown for 2,628 yards and 20 touchdowns this season, and he’s rushed for six more scores. Topics:
